channel.title: DoomedLegacy || Great Combat || Achievement System || Amazing Content
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/317rsps/media/Doomedlegacylogooo_zps175a3a42.png.html][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t631/317rsps/Doomedlegacylogooo_zps175a3a42.png[/img][/URL][/center]
[center]Welcome to DoomedLegacy, We are a newly opened RSPS with ton of content to make your stay more enjoyable. We don't have a crappy economy with overpriced items and hard to obtain items. There is multiple Experience rates you can pick from to make things more challenging. Difference rates has different Pros & Cons. We welcome all new players and will soon be looking for active staff.[/center]
[center][URL=http://"http://doomedlegacy.byethost14.com"]Forums[/URL] || [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/lwccnwwsinu9o9v/DoomedLegacy.jar?dl=0"]Desktop Client[/URL]
[u][i][b]
Server Features[/b][/i][/u]
99% Uptime 4 Different Game Modes with each benefits Multiple Dungeoneering Floors Loyalty Shop Working Clue Scrolls All Working Skills Effigy System Achievement System with 28 Achievements Glacors Multiple Training Locations that fit your style Multiple Minigames(Barrows, PC, Weapon Game, etc.) Different bosses that drop various rares(Ava, Nex, Corp, T Demons, etc) Great combat system Prestige System Multiple Skilling zones with great features Able to Pk anywhere with the ability to turn it on and off PvM, PvP & Skilling based Eco Working Godwars Active Staff Team Ability to zoom in and out Constant Updates Working Duel Arena with staking + Many More
Home [URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/317rsps/media/Home_zps5515621f-1.png.html][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t631/317rsps/Home_zps5515621f-1.png[/img][/URL]
Neitznot Skilling [URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/317rsps/media/NeitznotSkilling_zps9e1a7cb5.png.html][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t631/317rsps/NeitznotSkilling_zps9e1a7cb5.png[/img][/URL]

Weapon Game [URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/317rsps/media/WeaponGame_zpsc7b95dd7.png.html][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t631/317rsps/WeaponGame_zpsc7b95dd7.png[/img][/URL]
Wyvern [URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/317rsps/media/Wyvern_zps9c0e1fda.png.html][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t631/317rsps/Wyvern_zps9c0e1fda.png[/img][/URL]
Glacors [URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/317rsps/media/Glacors_zps7332abb1.png.html][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t631/317rsps/Glacors_zps7332abb1.png[/img][/URL]
Comp Cape Features [URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/317rsps/media/Deha5ZO_zps67086f76.png.html][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t631/317rsps/Deha5ZO_zps67086f76.png[/img][/URL]
Custom Teleporting System [URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/317rsps/media/Screenies_zpsbc5b8d39.png.html][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t631/317rsps/Screenies_zpsbc5b8d39.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/317rsps/media/PlayerKilling_zpsfd6514a8.png.html][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t631/317rsps/PlayerKilling_zpsfd6514a8.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/317rsps/media/SkillingTeles_zps12fc02e1.png.html][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t631/317rsps/SkillingTeles_zps12fc02e1.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/317rsps/media/Minigames_zpsfe01c9a3.png.html][IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t631/317rsps/Minigames_zpsfe01c9a3.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: DoomedLegacy || Great Combat || Achievement System || Amazing Content
item.dc:creator: @317rsps 317rsps
item.description:
@317rsps wrote:

[center][URL=http://s1317.photobucket.com/user/317rsps/media/Doomedlegacylogooo_zps175a3a42.png.html][/URL][/center]

[center]Welcome to DoomedLegacy, We are a newly opened RSPS with ton of content to make your stay more enjoyable. We don’t have a crappy economy with overpriced items and hard to obtain items. There is multiple Experience rates you can pick from to make things more challenging. Difference rates has different Pros & Cons. We welcome all new players and will soon be looking for active staff.[/center]

[center][URL=http://“http://doomedlegacy.byethost14.com”]Forums[/URL] || [URL=http://“https://dl.dropbox.com/s/lwccnwwsinu9o9v/DoomedLegacy.jar?dl=0”]Desktop Client[/URL]

[u][i][b]

Server Features[/b][/i][/u]

99% Uptime
4 Different Game Modes with each benefits
Multiple Dungeoneering Floors
Loyalty Shop
Working Clue Scrolls
All Working Skills
Effigy System
Achievement System with 28 Achievements
Glacors
Multiple Training Locations that fit your style
Multiple Minigames(Barrows, PC, Weapon Game, etc.)
Different bosses that drop various rares(Ava, Nex, Corp, T Demons, etc)
Great combat system
Prestige System
Multiple Skilling zones with great features
Able to Pk anywhere with the ability to turn it on and off
PvM, PvP & Skilling based Eco
Working Godwars
Active Staff Team
Ability to zoom in and out
Constant Updates
Working Duel Arena with staking
+ Many More
